item.title: DynamoDB and Duplicate Keys in Global Secondary Indexes
item.description: If there's something in the documentation about what the behavior of a DynamoDB Global Secondary Index is when there are duplicate keys in the index, it isn't easy to find. I tested this empirically with an embedded DynamoDB mock for java and will quickly share my findings here with you.
